snippet: UEFA imposed a $150,000 fine and said it could deduct 6 points from Russia in the next round of Euro qualifying if its fans again turn unruly.
lead_paragraph: UEFA imposed a $150,000 fine and said it could deduct 6 points from Russia in the next round of Euro qualifying if its fans again turn unruly.

headline.seo: Euro 2012 — Russia Fined and Could Be Docked Points for Fans’ Outbursts
headline.main: Russia Is Fined and Could Be Docked Points for Fans’ Outbursts
headline.print_headline: Russia Is Fined and Could Be Docked Points for Fans’ Outbursts
